thread.title: Today's Facebook App Update Fixes Battery Life Issue On iOS
thread.title_full: Today's Facebook App Update Fixes Battery Life Issue On iOS

title: Today's Facebook App Update Fixes Battery Life Issue On iOS
text:
Published By: Forbes.com: Latest News - Today 
With today's Facebook app update for iOS, two of the issues causing unintended battery drain have been fixed. More may be on the way....
